name: Retro Pixel Arcade
description:
Retro-style arcade featuring famous titles such as frogger, tetris, and snake on a dynamic HTML webpage.

Runs on the OLC Pixel Game Engine, C++, Webassembly, and other associated libraries.

How To Play: LEFT, RIGHT, UP, and DOWN arrows for movement, SPACEBAR for confirmation and shooting (asteroids), Z for rotation (tetris)
